woman is beautiful

Love From Our Customers

Recently tried O&O products and absolutely loved them!

The lipstick was super smooth, hydrating and long lasting. It did… read more not require any touch ups.

Velvet Kiss

Meha Patel

I ordered brunch date lip cheek eye color, i would like to say i am in love with the product,… read more its one of the best blush on i have ever used. The application was so smooth, perfectly able to blend, hardly took a second to apply.. It didnt make my skin dry at all which some of the powdered blush do. Loved the color and the stay. Highly recommended

All Over Color

Preeti

I’m not someone who likes using makeup but this no makeup set from O&O beauty was really lightweight and comfortable.… read more It gives the right sort of coverage without feeling heavy on the skin. Loved using the cheek tint, it’s amazing on the skin and love the packaging.

Ordering the Party edit soon!

The no make up edit

Vaani Beswal

The dome gives a beautiful glow on the cheeks and lovely sheen on the lips. I’m literally addicted to carrying… read more it with me wherever I go.

All Over Color

Natasha

For a flawless ‘barely-there’ makeup look with minimal effort, O&O products are your go-to. Their complexion and eyeshadow sticks offer… read more effortless blending and layering, and the blush imparts the most radiant glow. They’ve secured a permanent spot in my makeup collection, perfect for those days when I’m seeking a swift touch-up or an instant mood lift.

The party edit

Vaishnavi Mundhra

Love the shade romantic ruse !! Perfect for everyday wear and the correct nude color.

Velvet Kiss

Puja Agarwal

Effortless glam!

I’m loving using my O&O Products – Eyelights, Blush, Highlighter & Lipstick. It comes on really well and… read more the lightweight formula works brilliantly in this extremely hot and humid weather – doesn’t feel like it’s clogging your pores. And if you’re feeling lazy to doll up, you can go from 0 to glam in just a couple of swipes without looking too done up. I absolutely love the natural kind of glow it gives. Can’t wait for them to introduce more products!

Eye lights

Snehal mohta

Really like the lipstick!

Lasts for quite awhile and the Romantic ruse velvet kiss is a nice natural shade.… read more Will always be carrying this one!

Velvet Kiss

Nidhi Sharaff

Easy to use, subtle and perfect for the day as well as night!

All Over Color

Akanksha Sanghi

The Bubbly Rose, all over colour, has brought down my getting ready time by half! I love the dome shape,… read more so easy to dab all over the cheeks, lips and eyes…and to touch up later!! Absolutely love the product..so natural so soft!!

All Over Color

Kaveri Garg

The shade nostalgic rosewood is so pretty ,and the lipstick is actually really moisturising as it claims I’m extremely happy… read more with the quality of the product I recieved

Velvet Kiss

Gia Kabadi

Omg.. Absolutely love this product, my daily go to 2-1 all over colour with highlighter. It’s makeup infused with the… read more most incredible skin care, which makes my skin look dewy and feel super soft.

Glow Blush

Surabhi Agarwal Tuli

Love the fact that is is buildable, gives a natural flush and nice and creamy !

All Over Color

Isha sanghi

Hassle free and effortless I would say . the way it slides on my face I don’t have to use… read more any other make up products especially the ones that make me feel heavy . OandO has a USP of making it feel in your skin and give you the no makeup makeup look. Hands down to one of the best best products I have used so far .

The no make up edit

Vaidehi Mundhra

Absolutely love love the quality of all the products, they feel like second skin. Love that it’s all natural without… read more any harsh chemicals.

All Over Color

Arushi

Blends right in and feels like I am wearing no makeup.

Complexion Stick

Puja Agarwal

Love the buildable colour and the long stay formulation. Looks absolutely beautiful to be worn on eyes, lips or cheeks.

All Over Color

OandO has a USP of making it feel in your skin and give you the no makeup makeup look. Hands down to one of the best best products I have used so far .

The no make up edit

Vaidehi Mundhra

Effortless glam!

I’m loving using my O&O Products – Eyelights, Blush, Highlighter & Lipstick. It comes on really well and… read more the lightweight formula works brilliantly in this extremely hot and humid weather – doesn’t feel like it’s clogging your pores. And if you’re feeling lazy to doll up, you can go from 0 to glam in just a couple of swipes without looking too done up. I absolutely love the natural kind of glow it gives. Can’t wait for them to introduce more products!

Eye lights

Snehal mohta

Indulging in the smoky quartz eye lights, my new fav.. the texture is super smooth and light! Loving the… read more subtle yet impactful look on my eyes! A simple trial to now a new addiction for night outs.. My one and only eye preference nowadays!
